attributes.action: Protect The Wildlife On Marshland Fen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Marshland Fen is an internationally famous landscape that attracts tourists from everywhere who come to visit and see what has become known as the 'big sky'. It is an area containing many species of birds that are at the time of instigating this petition lawfully protected.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Protect The Wildlife On Marshland Fen."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16467


Prime Minister's Office
